summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Social Media Content Creator with improved flow featuring Viral Plug scripts. All 6 required features tested successfully with excellent results.
passed_tests: Script Selection Progress displays correct types (Other Script, Engagement Trigger, Viral Plug)
Script 4 position automatically shows Viral Plug Scripts tab with other tabs hidden
Remove links functionality works for each selected script
Summary page displays all 5 scripts with Position badges (Position 1-5)
Copy buttons work perfectly for Hook and all Script paragraphs with toast notifications
Back to Edit button successfully navigates back to Step 1 (Visual Style)
API endpoints return correct script types: other, engagement, viral_plug
Visual design is clean and professional with proper spacing and contrast
Stepper navigation works correctly through all 4 steps
Script type logic enforces Viral Plug requirement for position 4
